Name: xho-imaamismaaeelng
Author: Imaam Ismaaeel Ngqoyiyana
Source: The Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africe(IDM) , https://www.alqurantranslation.com/

Translations.Text: Nabani na lowo unikela ubuso bakhe kuAllâh, aze abe ngumenzi wokulungileyo lowo ubambelele kwesona Sandla sithembekileyo. Ke kaloku kuAllâh kulapho iziphumo zemibandela (yonke) zikhoyo
Ke yena lowo uye wangakholwa ukungakholwa kwakhe makungakukhathazi wena. KukuThi apho baza kubuyela khona, yaye Siza kubaxelela ngoko bakwenzayo. Inene, uAllâh Uyakwazi okusezifubeni zabo
Sibanika ulonwabo okwethutyana; kanti Sisaya kubanyanzela ukuba bangene kwisohlwayokazi esikhulu
Xa ubabuza: “Ngubani owadala amazulu nomhlaba?” Ngokuqinisekileyo baza kuthi: “NguAllâh.” Yithi ke wena: “Iindumiso zonke nemibulelo mazibe kuAllâh!” Kodwa uninzi lwabo alwazi nto
Kokuka-Allah okusemazulwini nasemhlabeni. Inene uAllâh, sisiTyebi, ngowokudunyiswa
Ukuba ngaba imithi le ibiziintsiba zokubhala nolwandle (olu luyi-inki), lize longezwe ngezinye iilwandle ezisixhenxe, amazwi ka-Allâh ebengayi kuphela. Inene, uAllâh nguSobunganga, uSobulumko
Ukudalwa kwenu nokuvuswa kwenu akuyi kuba yinto yimbi ngaphandle kokuba njengokuvuswa komphefumlo omnye. Inene, uAllâh Uyeva yaye Uyabona

Akuboni na okokuba uAllâh Wenza ubusuku bungene kwimini Aze enze imini ingene kubusuku, Waza Wenza ilanga nenyanga, nganye kuzo yabaleka (kweyayo indlela), kangangethuba elithile ezibekelwe lona, kwanokuba uAllâh, ngayo nantoni na eniyenzayo Unolwazi ngayo?’
Oko kungenxa yokuba uAllâh UyiNyaniso, ukanti ezo nto babiza kuzo ngaphandle kwaKhe zibubuxoki, nangenxa yokuba uAllâh Uphakamile, Mkhulu
Akuboni na ukuba iinqanawa ziwiza4 zinqumle ulwandle ngobabalo luka-Allah khona ukuze Anibonise imiqondiso yaKhe? Inene kuko oko kukho umqondiso kuye nabani na onomonde nonombulelo

Ke kaloku athi amaza esakubagquma okwamaphahla, bathandaze kuAllâh, benyanisekile kuYe enkolweni. Kodwa Esakubahlangulela emhlabeni kubakho abanye kubo abadikidiki (abaphakathi kokukholwa nokungakholwa). Ukanti akukho bani uzalayo iiVesi zeThu ngaphandle kwalowo unobungcatshi ongenambulelo

Hini na bantu, yoyikani iNkosi yenu noyike neMini apho kungekho tata uya kunceda nyana, kungekho nyana uya kunceda tata. Inene, isithembiso sika-Allâh siyinyaniso, ngoko musani ukwenza ubomi balo mhlaba bunikhohlise kananjalo ningakhohliswa ngumkhohlisi ngoAllâh

Inene, uAllâh (Yena Yedwa) Unolwazi lwe Yure yaye Uthoba imvula Esazi kananjalo okokuba yintoni na esezibelekweni. Ke kaloku akukho mphefumlo waziyo okokuba uza kuzuza ntoni na ngomso, kungekho mphefumlo waziyo okokuba uza kufela kwiliphi na ilizwe. Inene uAllâh Uyazi, Uyaqaphela
Alif-Lâm-Mîm
(Esi) sisityhilelo seNcwadi ekungekho ntandabuzo ngayo, sivela kwiNkosi yamaphakade

Okanye mhlawumbi bathi: “UMuhammad Uyiqambe ngokwakhe?” Ukusuka apho yona iyinyaniso evela eNkosini yakho, khon’ukuze ulumkise abantu abangazanga baba naMlumkisi uzayo (kubo) ngaphambili kunawe, ukuze bakhokeleleke

NguAllâh Owadala amazulu nomhlaba nako konke okuphakathikwawongeentsukuezintandathu;WazaWazimisa ngentla kweTrone. Nina ngaphandle kwaKhe aninamkhuseli okanye umthetheleli; ngoko ke aniyi kukhumbuzeka na
Yena Ucwangcisa yonke into esemazulwini nasemhlabeni; ukanti iza kuphinda inyukele kuYe ngeMini ebude bayo buyiminyaka eliwaka yaleyo niyibalayo
LoWo nguMazi wokungabonwayo, nongqinelwayo, uSobunganga, uSozinceba
Yena Wafezekisa zonke izinto Awazidalayo Waza Wayila indalo yomntu ngodongwe
Waza Wenza ukwanda kwakhe ngolwelo olunyanyekayo (imbewu yomntu)
Wambumba ngomlinganiselo ofanelekileyo, Wamphefumlela umoya wobomi, Wanenzela ukuva nokubona nentliziyo (ingqiqo); kuncinane enibulela ngako
Kananjalo bathi: “Sisakuba sele sinyamalele emhlabeni, ingaba ngenene siza (kuphinda sidalwe) sibe kwindalo entsha?” Eneneni bona kwindibano yabo neNkosi yabo abakholwa
